title: 2brs in a large 4br Fishtown rowhome, 1/1!
description:
Hello!
Myself and a housemate are moving out of the 4 bedroom house we share with 2 other girls. Both our rooms are available, the layout and sizes are almost identical. Rooms are $812.50/ea. First month and security of $375 to move in. Pets allowed, no pet deposit, just $25 extra each month.
The rooms are very big, I’m comfortable WFH in my room so it fits a desk and plenty of other bedroom furniture. Both rooms have their own private full bath, a ceiling fan, a big closet, and two big windows facing the street.
The house has 3 floors and a bigger backyard than most Fishtown row homes. There’s a washer/dryer in the basement, central air, gas stove, all pretty standard stuff. Unzoned parking, quiet street, super easy access to the highway. The house is very laid back, everyone pretty much keeps to themselves. In a word: chill. There’s also a cool dog here!
Email me for more info! Hoping to rent by 1/1.

title: On site washer and dryer, Garage and parking lot available
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Newly Renovated! Tolbut Court Apartments!
description:
Thank you for your interest in joining our community! We appreciate your inquiry, and we are excited that you have decided to consider our beautiful community as your future home!
To further assist you? When were you looking to move by? Are you interested in a studio, 1, or 2 bedrooms? Calculate your income, do you make 3x the monthly rent?
INCOME REQUIREMENT: You must gross 3x the monthly rent (no exceptions)
In order to apply you will need to provide 1 month’s worth of pay stubs, ID and social security card, Application fee is $45.00 per applicant (non-refundable) with a $250 holding fee (non-refundable). This will go towards your final move-in balance.
We are a pet-friendly community, all breeds welcome, with a two-pet max. There is a pet rent of $15 for one pet and $25 for two pets.
CURRENT AVAILABILITY
Studios and 1bedrooms, 2bedroom
Here are some features at Our property: 24-hr On-site Laundry, 24-hr Emergency Maintenance, and pet friendly.
Please provide a timeframe that works for you, and we will do our best to accommodate your availability. We would love to help you with any other questions you may have. Our Office Hours are Monday – Friday from 9 am – 4:30 pm. Saturday and Sunday tours are available for appointment only.
We look forward to hearing from you and helping you to find your new home here with us!

title: Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building
description:
Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using its smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheelchair accessibility and the new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. minimal room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 4th floor where you’ll find unit 408. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hardwood flooring, loft, and brick-exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of its high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #408

title: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous!
description:
Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. Does this sound like your new home? Schedule your showing today - This charmer will not last long!
1927 Brandywine St

title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.

title: Exceptional, carefree living right in the heart of desirable Ardmore
description:
Exceptional, carefree living right in the heart of desirable Ardmore! Originally built by renowned Main Line builder B.J. Drueding Builders, this is a rare opportunity to rent a fabulous, spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to everything location. Enter through the marble foyer to gleaming Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors that flow throughout. You'll enjoy effortless entertaining with a gourmet kitchen, designed with Brookhaven cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Adjacent to the kitchen is the dining room, ready for your family and guests. French doors lead to an intimate flagstone patio and garden to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The living room is spacious and airy, highlighted by a slate surround wood-burning fireplace, built-in cabinetry, shelving and bay window. The bright and spacious master suite is complete with walk-in closet, luxurious master bath with limestone vanity and large seamless glass shower. Special upgrades include all new energy efficient windows and sliding glass doors, updated HVAC, two new patios with exterior lighting, overhead cooling fans, new outside landscaping and hardwood floors throughout. For your convenience, you'll also find a laundry area with stackable washer and dryer. This well-situated condo includes two designated parking spaces, one in the enclosed garage, as well as a large storage unit. Enjoy the quiet and convenience of your new home as it is located within walking distance from Lower Merion HS, Suburban Square, Trader Joes and the Ardmore Farmer's Market. The nearby Ardmore train station provides Septa and Amtrak service to Center City, NY or Washington D.C. so that you may indulge in the best of the suburbs and easy access to the city.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. 1bedrooms,
